data.oai_dc:dc: This file contains the measures of the head width of foundresses, obligate parasites and usurpers in Polistes biglumis. Data were collected in the field, in years 2004-2008, in 4 populations (Mtg: Montgenèvre, French Hautes Alpes, Fer: Ferrere, Cuneo, Italy, Carì: Canton Ticino, Switzerland, MM: Monte Mare, Isernia, Italy).
geographic selection mosaic|strongly interacting species|predators|brood parasitism|social reversal|social insects
